name: Blockcade (Beta version)
description:
A fun little rage game to help you destroy your device.

If you do not like your device and want to have a new one, instead of just selling your current one, have fun destroying it!

This game is still in development, and I would appreciate recommendations and comments.

A and D/left arrow key and right arrow key for left/right movement.

Space bar for jump.

And escape key for quit[ which I hope you never have to use, but I put it in case of emergencies ;) ]
